rules_text:
When this enchantment enters, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it. Then that opponent draws a card.
Plot {2}{B} [i](You may pay {2}{B} and exile this card from your hand. Cast it as a sorcery on a later turn without paying its mana cost. Plot only as a sorcery.)[/i]
